title: Ship
description: STFC ship entity — the vessel itself, independent of crew or dock assignment.

tier.description: Ship tier (T1–T9). Higher tiers unlock crew slots and stats.

shipClass.description: Primary ship class. Determines combat triangle participation.

grade.description: Ship grade (G1–G7). Indicates the era/power tier of the ship design.

rarity.description: Ship rarity. Affects max power ceiling and build cost.

combatProfile.description: How this ship participates in combat. 'triangle' = Explorer/Interceptor/Battleship rock-paper-scissors. 'non_combat' = Survey/buffer ships. 'specialty' = loop-specific ships (Vidar, Voyager, etc.).

specialtyLoop.description: For specialty ships, which game loop they serve (e.g. 'borg', 'swarm', 'deep-space', 'latinum'). Null for non-specialty ships.

status.description: Operational status of this ship in the player's fleet.

importedFrom.description: Source label if imported from Google Sheets.
